doc.field: Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
Officers' files | Elbrun Kimmelman: Files Including Various Project Notes By Project (40 folders)
Officers' files | Elbrun Kimmelman: Files Including Various Project Notes By Project (40 folders)

Topics include: Application forms and various templates; Shop 50 Regalia; Recordkeeping; Digitization archives; Financials and investments -- Reimbursements, Liability and Investment Committee; Dutch language lessons; Program Committee; Activities -- Mary Park's suggestions; Metadata Assistant's Grant to New Netherland Institute; DHD Social Register Article; DHD Travel Guide, "Exploring Historic Dutch New York"; Dutch Research Guide, "Research Your Dutch Ancestors, a Practical Guide"; Knickerbocker Toast; Tulips and Cocktains (Mary 2011); St. Mark's Funding Request (2011); Great Barrington; Gift agreement between DHD and New-York Historical Society for Govert Loockermans deed; Event at New-York Historical Society for donation of Govert Loockermans deed; Grant report including grant to Mr. Artyom Anikin for Translation of COLVE Papers and gift to Netherlands Institute to complete digitization of 17th-century documents in New York Archives and 3-year webpage grant; DHD plaque at Pearl Street; Second Avenue Church Plaque; Restoration of Peter Stuyvesant Window, St. Mark's Church-in-the-Bowery; St. Mark's Church-in-the-Bowery iron gate project; Peter Stuyvesant TV program; DHD potential projects; "A Bit of Dutch Thanksgiving" message; Elbrun Kimmelman trip to Leiden as special guest; Anniversary Book; "A Dutch Republic" by Jonathan Israel; Related societies; New Amsterdam History Center; New Netherland Institute; Lafayett's Hermione (2011).
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
